offsetError.description: analog response to an input code of all zeros
offsetError.comment: units of percentage of full scale range

gainError.description: difference (in percentage of FSR) of how well the slope of the actual transfer function matches the ideal transfer function
gainError.comment: units of percentage of full scale range

integralNonlinearity.description: deviation of an actual transfer function from an ideal transfer function, in LSB

differentialNonlinearity.description: difference between the ideal and the actual output responses for successive DAC codes, in LSB

settlingTime.description: time from application of input code to valid output response

sampleRate.description: maximum rate at which the DAC can convert samples

otuputType.description: whether the DAC has a single ended or differential output

currentConsumption.description: current used by device in various power modes
